content.description: What we're learning this week in Kidmax.

image1.alt: A mother is holding her young child and smiling at the camera.

content.text1: All our lessons and downloads in one place! Scroll down to view the activities, lessons, and videos for this week. We upload new content every Friday.

Jesus 101 is a three-part course exploring who Jesus was, what his message is, and what it means to follow him. Anyone who wants to learn more about Jesus or discipleship is welcome!. Registration opens December 7, 2021.

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together, and talking.

content.text1: An overview of the big story of the Bible, from Genesis to Revelation. This course should help you zoom out to see the larger “meta-narrative” of Scripture, so that studying specific books or passages will make more sense in their context. Registration opens December 7, 2021.

image1.alt: Two men inside of a building smiling and hugging.

content.text1: This course is intended to help us engage with the world around us in a Jesus-centred way. From healthy use of our devices, to how to avoid being trapped in a social media echo chamber, we'll use tv shows, music, movies, and memes to help us move from being consumers of culture to creators. Registration opens December 7, 2021.

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together, and talking.

content.text1: Learn how this prolonged pandemic season of uncertainty and anxiety is impacting our kids and equip them for discipleship as we continue to navigate the choppy waters of culture and trauma. This workshop series will guide through facts about trauma and anxiety in this season, understanding identity in a Jesus-centred way, spiritual disciplines, and activities to foster a culture of prayer and kingdom goodness whether at home, at school or in the community. Registration starts December 7, 2021.
